channels.name: THR10C_Deluxe
channels.description: A low-gain preamp for sparkling American-style cleans, with 6L6 tubes in the output stage for brightness and a strong midrange.

channels.name: THR10_DC30
channels.description: EL84 power tubes in a true Class-A configuration with a highly responsive EQ for rich, complex harmonic tones and warm overdrive. Inspired by British chime.

channels.name: THR10_DC30
channels.description: EL84 power tubes in a true Class-A configuration with a highly responsive EQ for rich, complex harmonic tones and warm overdrive. Inspired by British chime.

channels.name: THR10_Modern
channels.description: Powerful modern distortion that fills out as the high-gain preamp is pushed. Tread carefully after 12 o'clock.

channels.name: THR10X_Brown1
channels.description: 12AX7 and 6L6 tubes in pursuit of the "Brown" sound. Set the gain around 11 o'clock for classic rock crunch, or crank it for saturated rhythm tones.

channels.name: THR10_Bass_Eden_Marcus
channels.description: Woody, vintage tone with late breakup.

channels.name: THR10_Aco_Condenser1
channels.description: Designed for acoustic-electric guitar, modeling the response of a boutique condenser microphone.

channels.name: THR10_Flat
channels.description: NA

channels.name: THR10C_BJunior2
channels.description: A low-watt EL34 design. Turning up the preamp gain will thicken up the cleans, then push into bluesy overdrive.

channels.name: THR10C_Mini
channels.description: A deceptively simple amp circuit with just a single 12AX7 and EL84. A full, no-frills tone that is highly responsive to picking dynamics.

channels.name: THR30_Blondie
channels.description: A version of the Classic/Lead circuit, modified for extra gain with a darker tone and scooped mids.

channels.name: THR30_FLead
channels.description: ECC83s into 6L6s for high gain with a highly responsive EQ, inspired by German engineering.

channels.name: THR10X_South
channels.description: Four 12AX7 preamp tubes into 6L6 output tubes. Tight, fast tracking for crushing highgain.

channels.name: THR10_Bass_Mesa
channels.description: Full, modern tone that breaks into a fuzz-like overdrive when pushed hard.

channels.name: THR10_Aco_Tube1
channels.description: Designed for acoustic-electric guitar, modeling the response of a boutique tube microphone.

channels.name: THR10_Flat
channels.description: NA

channels.name: THR30_Carmen
channels.description: A boutique, low-watt EL84 design that adds fullness and sustain as the master volume is turned up. A great match for neck pickups.

channels.name: THR30_SR101
channels.description: A mid-volume boutique design with 6550 power tubes. Listen for tight bass response and a singing sustain.

channels.name: THR10_Brit
channels.description: A high-gain design with 12AX7s into EL34s, for the tone that defined 1980s hard rock and heavy metal.

channels.name: THR10X_Brown2
channels.description: A boosted version of the Classic/Special amp, with even more gain for aggressive rhythms or searing leads.

channels.name: THR30_Stealth
channels.inspired_by: Booster circuit + EVH Stealth channel 3 mod
channels.description: A classic overdrive circuit before the preamp tightens low-frequency response and provides even more gain. Ideal for extended-range guitars.

channels.name: THR30_JKBass2
channels.inspired_by: JK's original based on Marshall circuits
channels.description: Vintage voicing with early breakup for overdrive that works well with bass or guitar.

channels.name: THR10_Aco_Dynamic1
channels.description: Designed for acoustic-electric guitar, modeling the response of a boutique dynamic microphone.

channels.name: THR10_Flat
channels.description: NA
